s_synopsis: This ain't no cartoon game. This is where real basketball is played... by real players on the street! If you can beat these guys and earn enough respect, you actually get to take on Scottie Pippin! A real interactive movie, not a computer generated game. Perform spectacular live-action moves to the hoop! Go one-on-one with five of the slammin'est hoopsters on the blacktop: Fingers, Juice, Mad Dog, Smash, and Scottie Pippin! Slam City has all the action of real one-on-one basketball. You can shoot or drive to the hoop, you can steal the ball or block shots, it's all in there.
